text: ākāśagaḷalli mattu bhūmiyalliruva ellavū allāhanigē sēride. Nīvu nim'ma manadoḷagina saṅgatigaḷannu vyaktapaḍisidarū guptavāgiṭṭarū, allāhanantū ā kuritu nim'maḍane vicāraṇe naḍesuvanu. Ā baḷika avanu tānicchisidavarannu kṣamisuvanu mattu tānicchisidavarannu śikṣisuvanu. Allāhanu ellavannū māḍaballavanāgiddāne
